channel.title: One question
channel.description: how do i play???? that's all i want to know i don't want to make a server i just want to play the game. I go to put in a server ip that is online on the server status thing and it says it's offline. I just want to play the game... can someone help me? lol

item.title: One question
item.dc:creator: @ritacame ritacame
item.description:
@ritacame wrote:

Start New server then put in a username and pass. Or if you want to join a server. File-New Server Put IP in. Then if it has a port. New port-Put in port.

Read full topic
